properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 6 at 2:44AM CST until February 8 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Nashville TN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a Flood Advisory for the
following rivers in Middle Alabama...Tennessee...

Elk River Near Prospect affecting Limestone and Giles Counties

.Heavy rainfall on Wednesday has caused the Elk River to rise above action stage.

The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a
* Flood Advisory for
The Elk River Near Prospect
* At 2AM Thursday the stage was 22.0 feet.
* Action stage is 22.0 feet.
* Flood stage is 25.0 feet.
* The river will rise to near 25.0 feet by tomorrow.
* At 25.0 feet...Water begins to flood Veto Rd near the Hargrove - Johnson
bridge south of Route 273.
* At 24.5 feet...Water begins to approach Veto Rd near the Hargrove - Johnson
bridge.
* At 22.0 feet...Water completely inundates the TWRA boat launch parking lot
near the Hargrove - Johnson bridge on Veto Rd.
properties.instruction:
Stay tuned to NOAA weather radio or other local media for further information
from the National Weather Service.
